prompt_conds:
// constraint: morsel == INVALID_VALUE is true
// expected return value/type: Err(DecodeError::InvalidByte(index_at_start_of_input, input[0]))

codes: let input: &[u8] = &[255, b'A', b'B', b'C', b'D', b'E', b'F', b'G'];
let decode_table: [u8; 256] = [INVALID_VALUE; 256]; // All values set to INVALID_VALUE
let input: &[u8] = &[b'A', 255, b'B', b'C', b'D', b'E', b'F', b'G'];
let decode_table: [u8; 256] = [INVALID_VALUE; 256]; // All values set to INVALID_VALUE

let decode_table: [u8; 256] = [INVALID_VALUE; 256]; // All values set to INVALID_VALUE
// Fill in a sample decode table for Base64 (assuming some values)
table[*c as usize] = i as u8;
table[b'='] = INVALID_VALUE; // Padding character not used for decoding
